app_descript:
App Name: WhatsDeleted

Package Name: com.q4u.viewdeletedmessage

Brief: WhatsDeleted offers a robust mechanism for retrieving erased messages and media from your notifications. This app stands out as a handy tool for anyone who has ever regretted missing out on important information due to message deletion. Along with recovery, it also features a Status Downloader, Caller ID functionality, and an integrated media player for a comprehensive user experience.
